duties_responsibilities.duty: Material requisition fulfillment, including locating, verifying, and labeling requested materials, performing required system transactions, and delivering materials to the specified area.
Receiving materials into the warehouse, verifying the count of goods received, and transferring them to the physical stock location with appropriate system transactions.
Performing weekly inventory cycle counts and annual physical inventory count if required, and resolving any discrepancies identified during the process.
Conducting equipment inspection of lift equipment prior to operation.
General housekeeping of the work area and completion of LMS Training.

education_certification.credential: H.S. Diploma or equivalent. Forklift certification preferred, and achieved within 6 months.
